Text:
well looks like a few more gold rush episodes have been
added on.. now 2 to go! and then some aftershows
to complete


16 (28) "In the Black" February 10, 2012
The Hoffman crew risks its all to run through the night in a bid to finally break even for the season. Fred has to abandon his best paydirt yet when his excavator gets stuck in the pit. John Schnabel returns to the Big Nugget Mine after his heart attack.
17 (29) "Frozen Out" February 17, 2012

18 (30) "Judgment Day" February 24, 2012

Why do you upload the torrent as episode 14 but your post clearly states this is episode 16 ? Most of your previous torrents from this show have been like this also.

As much as the upload is appreciated what I dont appreciate is the mis labeled torrents.

Toad, if you don't like the way that this guy does his torrents, then I'm sure that he won't be offended in any way if you pack your shit and move on.
All you have to do is download the way that its named, then rename it the way you want.
'don't appreciate it'..show some respect and gratitude for what you get..FOR FREE!!
Another fkn complainer... just download/seed and move the fck on !

tnx

he obivously dont read. cos some scenereleaser
renamed theres wrong dont mean I have to

a special is not part of the main series and should
of been called S02SP00 and so one

E9/E10 were specials.. hence why its pushed 2 episodes forward in the naming

Beggers can't be choosers, but common sense dictates to keep with the correct episode number.  We are all at the mercy of the seeders and posters.

What would suck is if the whole title was incorrect, but "In the Black" is the correct episode name.
